member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Learners.BayesPointMachineClassifierInternal.InferenceAlgorithms`3.ComputeLogEvidenceCorrection
member.summary: Computes the logarithm of the model evidence corrections required in batched training.
member.returns: The logarithm of the model evidence corrections.
member.remarks: When the training data is split into several batches, it is necessary to eliminate evidence contributions which would otherwise be double counted. In essence, evidence corrections remove the superfluous contributions of factors which are shared across data batches, such as priors and constraints. To compute the evidence contributions of the factors shared across batches, one can compute the evidence on an empty batch.

member.summary: Computes the logarithm of the model evidence contribution of an empty batch.
member.returns: The logarithm of the model computed evidence contribution of an empty batch.

The type of a label.
member.remarks: This interface allows to provide features in one of two representations: dense and sparse. To provide features in a dense representation, all arrays over feature indexes must be null and all instances must have the same number of feature values. To provide features in a sparse representation, each single instance must have the same number of feature indexes and values (arrays over feature indexes must not be null).

member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.CompoundDenseBinaryBpmTraining_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. If this is less than the number already done, message-passing is restarted from the beginning. Changing the observed values resets the iteration count to 0.

member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.CompoundDenseMulticlassBpmTraining_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.CompoundSparseBinaryBpmTraining_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. If this is less than the number already done, message-passing is restarted from the beginning. Changing the observed values resets the iteration count to 0.

member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message passing the given number of times
member.param: The number of times to iterate each loop
If true, messages that initialise loops are reset when observed values change

member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.CompoundSparseMulticlassBpmTrainingEvidence_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. If this is less than the number already done, message-passing is restarted from the beginning. Changing the observed values resets the iteration count to 0.

member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.CompoundSparseMulticlassBpmTrainingEvidence_EP.Update(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing an additional number of times
member.param: The number of iterations that should be executed, starting from the current message state. Messages are not reset, even if observed values have changed.

member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.GaussianDenseBinaryBpmPrediction_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. If this is less than the number already done, message-passing is restarted from the beginning. Changing the observed values resets the iteration count to 0.

member.param: The number of iterations that should be executed, starting from the current message state. Messages are not reset, even if observed values have changed.

member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.GaussianDenseMulticlassBpmTraining_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. member.name: M:MicrosoftResearch.Infer.Models.User.GaussianSparseMulticlassBpmTrainingEvidence_EP.Execute(System.Int32)
member.summary: Update all marginals, by iterating message-passing the given number of times
member.param: The total number of iterations that should be executed for the current set of observed values. If this is more than the number already done, only the extra iterations are done. Computes the area under the receiver operating characteristic curve for specified predictions given the ground truth provided by an instance source.
